postContent:
Citrus Mist is a design studio working across

  • Identity Design
  • Web Design & Development
  • Print Design
  • User Interface Design

Our output is striking and highly considered. We add value to our clients by helping them stand out and engaging their audience through high quality design.

Services

what we do

  • Graphic design and art direction
  • Web design
  • User interface design
  • Front end web development
  • Content management system development (WordPress only)
  • e-Commerce (Shopify only)

what we do

  • Brand strategy
  • Social media management and strategy
  • Search engine optimisation (always happt to recommend an expert)
  • Web development if we are not involved in the desing
